element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm creates a new polygons layer with buffers around features in the input layer. The size of the buffer depends on the values from a field in the attributes table of the input layer.

element.name: LAYER
element.text: The layer with features to buffer.

element.name: FIELD
element.text: The field in the attributes table which contains the size of the buffer to be created around each feature.

element.name: TYPES
element.text:
The following methods are available: * Inside the polygon. * Inside and outside the polygon. * Outside the polygon.
This parameter applies just if the input layer contain polygons. If the input layer contains points or lines, this parameter has no effect at all, since there is just one way of creating the buffer based on them.

element.name: RINGS
element.text: The number of concentric rings to create.

element.name: NOTROUNDED
element.text: If selected, resulting polygons will not be rounded.
